statements: UPDATE DeliveryRoutes SET origin='New York', destination='Los Angeles', distance=300.5 WHERE route_id=1;
UPDATE DeliveryRoutes SET destination='Miami', origin='Chicago', distance=500.2 WHERE route_id=2;
UPDATE DeliveryRoutes SET delivery_time = '2022-01-01 08:00:00' WHERE route_id = 1
UPDATE DeliveryRoutes SET origin = 'Warehouse A', destination = 'Customer B', distance = 125.75 WHERE route_id = 2
UPDATE delivery_routes SET distance = 15.5, delivery_time = '2022-08-25 10:30:00' WHERE route_id = 1
UPDATE route_history SET average_delivery_time = 4.75, optimization_results = 'Route optimized successfully' WHERE history_id = 3
UPDATE delivery_routes SET distance = 150.75, end_location = 'Warehouse B' WHERE route_id = 101
UPDATE route_history SET average_delivery_time = 3.5, optimization_results = 'Optimized route for faster delivery' WHERE history_id = 201
UPDATE delivery_routes SET start_location='Warehouse A', end_location='Customer X' WHERE route_id=101;
UPDATE driver_performance SET total_deliveries=50, avg_delivery_time='02:30:00' WHERE driver_id=201;
UPDATE delivery_routes SET start_location = 'Warehouse A', end_location = 'Customer Z' WHERE route_id = 101
UPDATE driver_performance SET missed_deliveries = 5, rating = 4.5 WHERE driver_id = 201
UPDATE delivery_routes SET distance_km = 15.6 WHERE route_id = 101;
UPDATE delivery_agents SET phone_number = '+1-123-456-7890' WHERE agent_id = 201;
UPDATE delivery_routes SET end_location = 'Warehouse A' WHERE route_id = 1;
UPDATE delivery_orders SET delivery_date = '2022-12-31' WHERE order_id = 10;

UPDATE delivery_history SET delivery_status = 'Delivered' WHERE history_id = 201;
UPDATE delivery_routes SET distance = 150.25, time_taken = 120 WHERE route_id = 101
UPDATE delivery_costs SET cost = 75.50 WHERE route_id = 102 AND vehicle_id = 201
